headline: Analyst Upgrades Highlight Data Center Power and Emissions Tailwinds Might Change The Case For Investing In Cummins (CMI)
summary: In recent days, multiple research firms, including Truist Securities, Barclays and Zacks, have upgraded Cummins and improved their earnings outlook, citing benefits from tightening emissions regulations and robust demand in its power solutions business. These upgrades highlight how Cummins’ growing role in data center backup power and preparation for EPA 2027 engine standards are becoming central to its long-term growth story. With analysts now emphasizing Cummins’ data center power...
